_handleRoyaltyEnginePayout(address,uint2.details: This method is external to enable setting a gas limit when called - see `_handleRoyaltyPayout`.

params._payoutCurrency: The ERC-20 token address to payout royalties in, or address(0) for ETH
params._tokenContract: The NFT Contract to get royalty information from
params._tokenId: , The Token ID to get royalty information from

returns._0: The remaining funds after paying out royalties

params._tokenContract: The ERC-721 token address of the offer
params._tokenId: The ERC-721 token ID of the offer

params._erc20TransferHelper: The ZORA ERC-20 Transfer Helper address
params._erc721TransferHelper: The ZORA ERC-721 Transfer Helper address
params._protocolFeeSettings: The ZORA Protocol Fee Settings address

params._expiry: Timestamp after which the ask expires
params._offerAmount: The amount of ERC20 token offered
params._tokenContract: The address of the ERC-721 token
params._tokenId: The id of the ERC-721 token

params._tokenContract: The address of the ERC-721 token
params._tokenId: The id of the ERC-721 token

params._tokenContract: The address of the ERC-721 token
params._tokenId: The id of the ERC-721 token

params._offerCurrency: The address of the ERC-20 token offered
params._tokenContract: The address of the offer ERC-721 token
params._tokenId: The ID of the offer ERC-721 token

setRoyaltyEngineAddress(address).details: emergency use only  requires a frozen RoyaltyEngineV1 at commit 4ae77a73a8a73a79d628352d206fadae7f8e0f74  to be deployed elsewhere, or a contract matching that ABI

params._royaltyEngine: The address for the new royalty engine

params._interfaceId: The identifier of a given interface

returns._0: If the given interface is supported

_handleRoyaltyEnginePayout(address,uint2.notice: Pays out royalties for NFTs based on the information returned by the royalty engine

cancelOffer(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Cancels the given offer for an NFT

createOffer(address,uint256,address,uint.notice: Creates an offer for a given NFT

createOfferMinimal(address,uint256).notice: Creates a simple WETH offer for a given NFT

fillOffer(address,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Fills an offer for a given NFT

setOfferAmount(address,uint256,uint256,a.notice: Updates the price of the given offer

setRoyaltyEngineAddress(address).notice: Update the address of the Royalty Engine, in case of unexpected update on Manifold's Proxy

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Implements EIP-165 for standard interface detection
